item.title: Broken glass and beer cans discarded., 27th November
item.description:
Beer cans discarded, broken glass on Ancona Road outside the school, roand not being swept on a regular basis, general rubbish discarded on Ancona Road, Not safe for children walking empty bottles, broken glass. If this can be addressed as a matter of urgency.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walmer Terrace, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive rubbish in Academy Buildings, 27th November
item.description:
Excessive bags of litter and litter outside of bags have been dumped in this area - this also has food and it is a concern that it could attract rodents. I am not sure who placed this rubbish in this location - hoping you can help rectify.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fanshaw Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing public bin, 27th November
